Wow! Nice post! If only someone had created this dank meme before...

On Topic: I remember back in the days where I would verse stupid opponents I would go Boots 3 Mana Pots 1 HP Pot and spam my Q at level one WHENEVER it was off cool down, and at Lvl 2 it was a 90% First Blood, at Lvl3 it was practically 100% guaranteed.

His kit's naturally a little overwhelming to be honest, and alike old-Talon, the dash (blink for Talon) has CC and really limits counter play tot he ground. Talon got his rekt so why not Pantheon?
